DOC.brief_summary: Oxytocin medication often use strengthen contraction overcome delay labor progress . The primary aim study determine whether receive high dose oxytocin lower chance need cesarean section compare low dose oxytocin . Other aim include examine relationship dose oxytocin regimen length labor , postpartum hemorrhage , intrauterine infection , umbilical cord gas , neonatal Apgar score < 5 5 minute , need neonatal intensive care .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Low-dose High-dose Oxytocin Regimens Labor Augmentation
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize double blind clinical trial consent nulliparous woman spontaneous labor require oxytocin labor augmentation seek determine whether use high dose oxytocin regimen improves obstetric outcome compare low dose oxytocin regimen , manner safe mother neonate . This project include 1002 woman recruit obstetrical service Prentice Women 's Hospital . Women include least 36 week gestation , singleton pregnancy , diagnose spontaneous labor spontaneous rupture membrane . Women expose oxytocin indication labor augmentation discretion obstetric provider . Women randomize equal probability intervention group use fix allocation procedure . To maintain double blind design , Prentice Women 's Hospital pharmacy carry randomization oxytocin solution accord random assignment neither woman care provider investigator know identity intervention assignment . The low-dose oxytocin regimen group receive start oxytocin regimen concentration rate 2 milliunits/minute increase increment 2 milliunits/minute , per discretion obstetric provider . The high-dose oxytocin regimen group receive start oxytocin regimen concentration rate 6 milliunits/minute increase increment 6 milliunits/minute , per discretion obstetric provider . Once woman enrol , randomize , receipt assign intervention , clinical management leave discretion woman 's obstetric provider . Prior discharge hospital , baseline demographic clinical data obtain via chart review .
DOC.criteria: Able give inform write consent Age 1845 year Nulliparous Pregnant singleton gestation equal great 36 week Diagnosed least 6 regular uterine contraction observation period 60 minute least one following : spontaneous rupture membrane , OR cervix great equal 3 centimeter dilate OR cervix least 80 % efface . The participant 's attend obstetric physician midwife determine participant need administration oxytocin infusion labor augmentation . Labor augmentation define stimulation uterine contraction spontaneous contraction fail result progressive cervical dilation descent fetus . Women meet criterion History prior cesarean section uterine surgery Fetus noncephalic presentation Participant undergoing labor induction NonEnglish speaking
